snippet: HOWARD--Bernard. October 20, 1921. Bunch, Seventy three years of marriage, you were my north star and my constant companion. I will love you always. May you rest in peace. Irma 1/3
lead_paragraph: HOWARD--Bernard. October 20, 1921. Bunch, Seventy three years of marriage, you were my north star and my constant companion. I will love you always. May you rest in peace. Irma 1/3
